document.full_text: doctors also raised concerns about those who cleaned up oil from last year's gulf of mexico disaster and said that the government has not been quick enough in studying health effects of that spill.
document.title: oil spills may leave more emotional than physical scars, study finds
lines_and_colors: doctors also raised concerns about those who cleaned up oil from last year's gulf of mexico disaster and said that the government has not been quick enough in studying health effects of that spill.
